attributes.title: This app ruined my life!!!
attributes.review: I had this app for ONE day, in honor of our president donny. Then all of my social media’s were hacked simultaneously and the hackers spreader false information that i killed babies. WHO DOES THAT, this app took my information and and sold it on the dark web, my bank accounts were drained and they leaked my address and someone stole my dog. When i opened up the app the next day a message appeared saying that they leaked al my information, I can’t believe my president would do this to me with his app.

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: I would rate it with no stars but was unable to. Glitches like the simulation. I don’t like the color orange or the name trump. This is for trying to ban Tik Tok🧚🏽✨

attributes.title: inadequate
attributes.review: i made bought this to make sure my non-homophobic president of color get somewhere , to say i’m disappointed is an understatement . ✨🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Ok who paid for this?
attributes.review: God where to begin. I’m sorry for the programmers who had to work on this app, they obviously weren’t paid enough nor given enough time to make it completely whole. The budget was just not there.

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: Delete this app ASAP!!! This app caused my dog to die, my turtle to get a spray tan, and my grandma to turn into a rat. After these sad events, I forgot I had the app. I decided to get on the app, but as soon as I opened it, a pop up add saying “if you vote for trump a demon in the form of Denny Ryan will be in your room at 3:00am. I thought nothing of it and proceeded with my day. 12:00am comes around, so I’m getting tired. I watch a movie and then..at 2:29am I woke up, in a sweat and breathing so heavy. I use my inhaler. It’s 3:00am..BOOM Debby Ryan bust through my closet and haunts my dreams. It was such a terrifying, traumatizing event. I haven’t opened the app since.

attributes.title: Trump is a racist
attributes.review: Based souly on the fact that trump is a racist I am giving his app a 1 star. If I could give a zero star I would

attributes.title: Very bad app
attributes.review: It is not a terrific app. It is not the best app ever. Very very bad app. The worst app we have ever seen.

attributes.title: This app needs to be deleted
attributes.review: I’m a proud trump supporter and thought this app would be good but it deleted all of my apps and photos and keeps crashing my phone and I don’t know what to do because it won’t let me delete the app from my phone. It needs to be took off the App Store immediately, Thank you.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Directions were waayyyyy too unclear. Do I put the fork in the toaster before or after I turn it on? Oh and the app tried to steal my phone number and kept sending me notifications. 1 star, periodt 😐

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: trump supporters after given reasons of why trumps a bad president: 🧑‍🦯🧑‍🦯🧑‍🦯
